name: demo-k6-with-grafana
description: Exemplo de arquiteturas para testes de performance usando o K6 com visualização no Grafana

scripts.docker:FullFlowSmoke: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/FullFlowSmoke.test.js
scripts.docker:FullFlowLoad: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/FullFlowLoad.test.js
scripts.docker:FullFlowSoak: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/FullFlowSoak.test.js
scripts.docker:FullFlowSpike: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/FullFlowSpike.test.js
scripts.docker:FullFlowStress: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/FullFlowStress.test.js
scripts.docker:journeyStress: docker-compose up -d influxdb grafana && webpack && docker-compose run k6 run /dist/journeyStress.test.js

author: Tiago Oliveira
